HotelElement.Name: The Club at Brickell Bay by Executive Corporate Rental

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Executive Corporate Rental at (The Club At Brickell Bay) in Miami (Brickell), you'll be convenient to Mary Brickell Village and Port of Miami. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Miami Convention Center and Bayfront Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned rooms featuring microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a fitness center.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include laundry facilities and an elevator (lift). Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

The preferred airport for Executive Corporate Rental at (The Club At Brickell Bay) is Miami, FL (MIA-Miami Intl.) - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
